pre_caption: This video presents a digital cityscape scenery shot, depicting a futuristic urban environment under a bright, cloudy sky. In the foreground, simplified, block-like structures frame a view across a body of water that reflects the sky and distant buildings. The background features a dense cluster of skyscrapers, including the prominent Burj Khalifa and another uniquely shaped tower. There is no single main subject, as the low-angle, wide perspective is used to emphasize the grand scale and atmosphere of the entire metropolis rather than focusing on any individual element.
pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.

initial_feedback:
This video effectively showcases a digital cityscape under a bright, partly cloudy sky. In both the foreground and midground, simplified, block-like structures frame a view on either side of a body of water, which reflects the sky and distant buildings. The background features several skyscrapers within a dense cluster of taller block-like structures, which are taller than those in the foreground but shorter than the skyscrapers. The wide-angle perspective successfully highlights the grand scale and atmosphere of the entire metropolis without focusing on any single main subject. Please ensure to include details such as the prominent Burj Khalifa and another uniquely shaped tower, as described. Additionally, consider replacing "low-angle" with "level-angle" for improved clarity.
The background features several(not a dense cluster of )skyscrapers, including the prominent Burj Khalifa and another uniquely shaped tower, surrounded by a dense cluster of taller block-like structures that are shorter than the skyscrapers.
